sentence.Network_en: We must concentrate our energies on treating addiction first.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们必须首先集中精力治疗毒瘾。

sentence.Network_en: Their energies were focussed on the alleviation of the refugees' misery.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们把精力集中在减轻难民们的苦难上。

sentence.Network_en: He devoted his energies to the reformation of science.

PerfectNetExp.abs: at such energies , electrons and positrons must be accelerated in a straight line ; accelerating them in a ring would result in excessive energy loss from a process called synchrotron radiation .在这麽高的能量下，电子与正子必须以直线加速，若以环状加速器加速会因为所谓的同步辐射效应而造成相当大的能量损失。
they devoted all their energies to the job ., 他们把自己的全部精力投入到这项工作中.
if you hands are nervous and cold , that will hamper the energies .如果你的手是抖动和冰凉的，就会妨碍能量流动。
you are now baptized in the New Light , initiated to new energies .您现在在新的光中洗礼，开始到新的能量中。

安耐吉化学(Energy Chemical) 黄金产品推荐投诉联系电话： 021-58432009 / 400-005-6266 联系传真： 021-58436166-800 电子邮 …
...绝大部分都直接或间接地来自太阳。正是各种绿色植物通过光合作用把太阳能（solar energy）转变成化学能在植物体内贮存下来。煤炭、石油、天然气等化石燃料也是由古代埋在地下的动植物经过漫长的地质年代演变形成的。此外，水能、风能等也都是由太阳能（solar energy）转换来的。地球本身蕴藏的能量通常指与地球内部的热能有关的能源和与原子核反应有关的能.

entry.def: Energy is the ability and strength to do active physical things and the feeling that you are full of physical power and life.

example.ex: He was saving his energy for next week's race in Belgium...
example.tran: 他正为下周在比利时的比赛养精蓄锐。

example.ex: We try to boost our energy by eating.
example.tran: 我们试图通过吃东西来增强体力。

entry.def: Energy is determination and enthusiasm about doing things.

example.ex: At 54 years old her energy and looks are magnificent...
example.tran: 她54岁了，精力和气色都非常好。

example.ex: You have drive and energy for those things you are interested in.
example.tran: 你对那些感兴趣的事情干劲十足。

entry.def: Your energies are your efforts and attention, which you can direct towards a particular aim.

example.ex: She had started to devote her energies to teaching rather than performing...
example.tran: 她已经开始将精力从表演转移到教学中。

example.ex: We must concentrate our energies on treating addiction first.
example.tran: 我们必须首先集中精力治疗毒瘾。

entry.def: Energy is the power from sources such as electricity and coal that makes machines work or provides heat.

example.tran: 那些支持利用核能的人

example.ex: Oil shortages have brought on an energy crisis...
example.tran: 石油短缺已经造成了能源危机。

auth_sentence.content: I agree with any proposal that includes renewable energies.
auth_sentence.res_content: I agree with any proposal that includes renewable energies.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I agree with any proposal that includes renewable energies.

auth_sentence.content: Is that where you want to focus your energies?
auth_sentence.res_content: Is that where you want to focus your energies?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Is that where you want to focus your energies?

auth_sentence.content: Schumann then focused his musical energies on composing.
auth_sentence.res_content: Schumann then focused his musical energies on composing.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Schumann then focused his musical energies on composing.
